alert.note: Alert for Deer Lodge (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 05 at 2:03PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Montana, including the following county, Deer Lodge. This includes the following Specific Areas... West Valley near Anaconda. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas, as well as rock and mudslides. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 202 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - https://www.weather.gov/mso/hydrology
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
